events.message: I have filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at the traffic light. The damage seems significant and I need urgent assistance.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the report of the collision and vehicle damages.
An agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle your vehicle accident claim for further processing and investigation.
Your claim regarding the car accident has been acknowledged by our insurance company and we will proceed with the next steps immediately.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of your driverâ€™s license to continue processing your vehicle collision claim.
All requested documents including the police report, images of the damaged car, and license copy were submitted successfully to support the claim process.
An investigation has been initiated concerning the collision and car damages to evaluate the validity and extent of the claim submitted.
The investigation regarding the auto accident has been completed, confirming fault of the other party and estimate damages on your vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the investigation results and damage assessment to cover the repair costs for your vehicle.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and coverage of their vehicle repairs.
Your claim has been officially approved. Funds will be allocated for repair costs as per the agreed settlement.
The payment for your car repairs following the accident claim has been issued to the repair shop and your account was notified.
The claim regarding your auto accident has been closed successfully after confirming all repairs were completed and payment received.
Your auto accident claim files have been archived in our system for future reference should you require any further assistance.
